column4: I created an Ubuntu Netbook Remix USB stick with the USB Startup Creator. I'm trying to install it on an EeePC, but it won't boot. "Removable Dev." is selected as the first boot device in the BIOS. Any ideas?
What happens when you try it?
YOu may not have rendered it bootable.
it just boots into Xandros. Doing a cfdisk on the stick shows the boot flag is enabled.
